Projects.title: Smart Watch
Projects.description: The project aims to make a prototype of a cheaper fitness watch using a microcontroller with a fall detection system.
Projects.fullDescription: The project aims to make a prototype of a cheaper fitness watch using a microcontroller with a fall detection system.

Projects.title: Fielding Robo
Projects.description: Utilize Computer Vision and PID Control to create a functional bot which can catch an object coming to it.

Projects.title: Virtual Clothing Try-on System
Projects.description: GAN-powered software which allows you to visualize how a garment looks on you without having to leave the comfort of your home.

Projects.title: Maglev Platform
Projects.description: Develop a magnetic levitating platform which can carry a load of more than 5kgs.

Projects.title: Virtual Telepresence Robot
Projects.description: The robot is capable of capturing the environment in a remote location in virtual form using Raspberry Pi.

Projects.title: EEG based Motor Control
Projects.description: We will read EEG data, analyze it and classify it. We will use it to move a robotic gripper.

Projects.title: Desktopography
Projects.description: Guide the computer to click and drag at the location of fingertip using hand tracking and distance thresholding.

Projects.title: LiFi: Visible Light Communication
Projects.description: Li-Fi is a portmanteau of “Light” and “Wi-Fi”. It relies on using visible light for transmission of data, instead of radio waves.

Projects.title: FPGA
Projects.description: This project aims to emulate the behavior of a real quantum system, capable of running quantum algorithms on FPGA.

Projects.title: Smart Gamer
Projects.description: In this project we build an interactive game which can be controlled using any object and also build an AI which can play on its own.

Projects.title: Swarm Robotics
Projects.description: Swarm robotics is an approach to the coordination of multiple robots as a system which consists of large numbers of robots.

Projects.title: E-Wall
Projects.description: E-Wall lets us convert a normal static wall into an interactive wall that can detect touch and multi-touch gestures.

Projects.title: WiTrack: Human Tracking
Projects.description: WiTrack is a device that tracks the 3-D motion of the user from the radio signals reflected off their body.

Projects.title: EMG: Hand Gesture Recognition
Projects.description: Wearable technology is the future of electronics gadgets. As interesting as it seems, it has myriad applications.

Projects.title: FPGA based audio processor
Projects.description: If we consider the situation of attending a party, our ears capture numerous sounds: a friend’s voice, background music and many others.

Projects.title: Gesture recognition using IMU
Projects.description: We will put IMU sensor on hand band and then using this sensor we will calculate the trajectory of the hand.

Projects.title: Smart Lock
Projects.description: Smart Lock is an internet-controlled biometric security lock. It has been specifically developed for Electronics Club main door.

Projects.title: Mood Visualization
Projects.description: With the boom in information technology, there is so much data available on the internet- 'The Big Data'.

Projects.title: Smart Handshake
Projects.description: The SmartBand is a wearable bracelet-like device that exchanges information about its users and their relationships.

Projects.title: Social Robot
Projects.description: Robots have always fascinated mankind. Through the advancement in technology the world has been able to implement.

Projects.title: FPGA Music
Projects.description: The idea of the project is to represent various frequencies present in the audio input signal on a led matrix using FPGA.

Projects.title: Conway's Game of Life
Projects.description: The main aim of this project was to implement Conway's game of life (a cellular automata) on a grid of 16x16 led matrices.

Projects.title: Fitness Tracker
Projects.description: The field of wearable electronics has the potential to revolutionize our lifestyle. Our aim was to develop a complete package.

Projects.title: Surveillance Camera
Projects.description: We have made an advanced surveillance camera capable of face detection and at the same time recognizing the face detected.

Projects.title: 3D Laser Scanner
Projects.description: We are making a scanner for 3D objects using laser. What we are going to do is, throw a planar laser on object (kept in dark surrounding).

Projects.title: Pi Enabled Tracking Bot
Projects.description: We have made a robot capable of Surveillance and also with an alternate application in detecting and following a pre-specified object.

Projects.title: Laser Tag
Projects.description: We have made a laser tag gaming system comprising of laser gun, sensor jacket, and helmet. The laser gun emits lasers.

Projects.title: Aura Play
Projects.description: luminAR provide you with a computer interface on your desk workspace. Developed such as to provide you with an intuitive interaction.

Projects.title: Cashless Campus
Projects.description: An electronic payment and billing system using a TFT Display, touchscreen, and a thermal printer for printing invoice and/or coupons.

Projects.description: A LED cube is like a LED screen, but it is special as it has 3D. We can think it as of low-resolution displays.

Projects.description: Bringing for you a dazzling gaming experience that will certainly amaze you by its speed, thrill, and entertainment.

Projects.description: Do you often miss out on several important events because you simply forget about them? 'ASSIST U' is an android app which eases.

Projects.title: Hole in the Wall
Projects.description: Games played with joysticks are growing outdated by the introduction of many innovative user controls. Kinect being one of them.

Projects.title: Kinect Dodge Ball
Projects.description: A realtime multiplayer game based on kinect and android phone. Kinect connected to a pc recognizes the gestures of a player.

Projects.title: Text Recognition
Projects.description: We made a project in which we just take an image and process it to extract the text present in the image.

Projects.title: Evo Mouse
Projects.description: Evo Mouse, a product that would let people control normal mouse operations just by using their natural hand movements.

Projects.description: Think of the noisiest places, the quietest places and the busiest places you have been to. How many times have you missed an important call.

Projects.description: A self-balancing platform consists of a platform which is balanced by the movement of three motors in the opposite direction to the movement.

Projects.description: An Arduino based tablet that uses Smart GPU display, designing the basic GUI of the tablet and developing various applications.

Projects.title: E- Glove
Projects.description: Isn’t it fascinating to interact with your computer with hand gestures? Here we introduce a glove which user can wear on his right hand.

Projects.description: Here we present before you an innovative approach to compare your concentration with your friend’s. It is basically a game which player.

Projects.description: Build a scientific calculator on FPGA board using Verilog as HDL, this would handle floating point numbers (32-bit, single precision).
